briefTitle: Mindful After Cancer: A Mindfulness-based Therapy Intervention for Sexual Health After Cancer
officialTitle: Mindful After Cancer Study: Fostering Positive Body Image, Sexual Health, and Well-being
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosis of breast or gynecologic cancer at least one year prior to enrollment
* English speaking
* Have access to a computer, smart phone, or tablet with internet access
* Ability to spend 15-30 minutes per day on program activities

Exclusion Criteria:

- Stage 0 (carcinoma in situ)
